00020 using namespace mcGeometry;
00021 
00022 using std::cout;
00023 using std::endl;
00024 
00025 typedef std::vector<double> doubleVec;
00026 
00027 /*============================================================================*/
00028 void runTests() {   
00029 
00030     /* * * create sphere * * */
00031     doubleVec center(3,0.0);
00032     double    sphRadius = 2.0;
00033 
00034     Sphere    theSphere(center, sphRadius);
00035 
00036     /* * * create plane * * */
00037     doubleVec normal(3,0.0);
00038 
00039     normal[0] = 1.0;
00040 
00041     center[0] = 1.0;
00042 
00043     Plane thePlane(normal, center);
00044 
00045     /* * * create cell boundaries * * */
00046     Cell::QASVec cellBoundaries(2);
00047 
00048     // define it as inside sphere to the right of plane
00049     cellBoundaries[0] = std::make_pair(&theSphere, false);
00050     cellBoundaries[1] = std::make_pair(&thePlane,  true);
00051 
00052 
00053     /* * * create the cell * * */
00054     Cell theCell(cellBoundaries);
00055 
00056     /* * * CHECK VARIOUS POINTS * * */
00057     doubleVec particleLoc(3,0.0);
00058 
00059     particleLoc[0] = 1.5;
00060     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(theCell.isPointInside(particleLoc) == true);
00061 
00062     particleLoc[0] = 0.5;
00063     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(theCell.isPointInside(particleLoc) == false);
00064 
00065     particleLoc[1] = 3.5;
00066     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(theCell.isPointInside(particleLoc) == false);
00067 
00068     /* * * FIND DISTANCES * * */
00069     particleLoc[0] = 1.5;
00070     particleLoc[1] = 0.0;
00071 
00072     doubleVec particleDir(3,0.0);
00073 
00074     particleDir[0] = -1.0;
00075 
00076     Quadric* hitQuadric;
00077     bool     quadricSense;
00078     double   distance;
00079 
00080     theCell.intersect(particleLoc, particleDir, hitQuadric, quadricSense,
00081                       distance);
00082 
00083     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS( hitQuadric   == &thePlane );
00084     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS( quadricSense == true );
00085     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS( softEquiv(distance, 0.5) );
00086     
00087     particleLoc[0] = 1.5;
00088     particleDir[0] = 1.0;
00089 
00090 //    cout << theSphere << endl << thePlane << endl;
00091 //    cout << "Position: " << particleLoc
00092 //         << " Direction: " << particleDir << endl;
00093 
00094     theCell.intersect(particleLoc, particleDir, hitQuadric, quadricSense,
00095                       distance);
00096 
00097     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS( hitQuadric   == &theSphere );
00098     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS( quadricSense == false );
00099     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS( softEquiv(distance, 0.5) );
00100 }
00101 
00102 /*============================================================================*/
00103 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00104    TESTER_INIT("Cell");
00105    try {
00106       runTests();
00107    }
00108    catch (tranSupport::tranError &theErr) {
00109       cout << "UNEXPECTED ERROR IN UNIT TEST: " << endl
00110          << theErr.what() << endl;
00111       TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(false);
00112    }
00113 
00114    TESTER_PRINTRESULT();
00115    
00116    return 0;
00117 }
